ViewObject.Name: RentalQuotesVO
ViewObject.SelectList: XxadsRentalQuoteEO.ACTIVE_FLAG, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.APPROVED_DATE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CREATED_BY, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CREATION_DATE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CUST_SITE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CUSTOMER_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CUSTOMER_STATUS, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.DEPARTMENT_CODE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.DEPARTMENT_NAME, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_SET_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.DIV_FLEX_VAL_SET_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.MASTER_QUOTE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.PARENT_QUOTE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.PREPARED_BY, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.PROJECT_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.QUOTATION_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.QUOTE_DATE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.QUOTE_NUMBER, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.QUOTE_STATUS, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.QUOTE_TYPE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REMARKS, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REQ_BU_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REVISED_BY, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REVISED_ON, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REVISION_NUMBER, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REVISION_REASON, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SITE_USE_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VAL_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SRC_DIV_FLEX_VAL_SET_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SRC_DIVISION, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SUBMITTED_BY, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SUBMITTED_DATE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.VALID_FROM, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.VALID_TO, (select inv.bu_name from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID) AS TRANSSOURCEBU, (select nvl(sop.division_required,'N') from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID) AS TRANSSOURCEDIVREQUIRED, (select sop.segment_num from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID) AS TRANSSRCDIVFLEXSEGMENTNUM, (select inv.bu_name from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REQ_BU_ID) AS TRANSREQUESTINGBU, (select sop.SEGMENT_NUM from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REQ_BU_ID) AS TRANSREQBUDIVSEGMENT, (select sop.DEPT_SEGMENT_NUM from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REQ_BU_ID) AS TRANSREQBUDEPTSEGMENT, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_CUSTOMER_TYPES' and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE) AS TRANSCUSTOMERTYPE, (select xpj.project_number||' - '||xpj.project_name from xxpj_projects_t xpj where xpj.project_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.PROJECT_ID) AS TRANSPROJECT, (select fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID) AS TRANSDIVISION, (select fv.flex_value||' - '|| fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID) AS TRANSDEPTNAME, (select xcdt.customer_name from xxfi_customer_details_t xcdt where xcdt.cust_account_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CUSTOMER_ID) AS TRANSCUSTOMERNAME, (SELECT xcsdt.bill_to_site||' - '||xcsdt.address from xxfi_customer_site_details_t xcsdt where xcsdt.site_use_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SITE_USE_ID) AS TRANSCUSTOMERSITE, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_QUOTATION_STATUS' and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.QUOTE_STATUS AND xlvt.application_id = 13) AS TRANSQUOTATIONSTATUS, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_CUSTOMER_STATUS' and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CUSTOMER_STATUS AND xlvt.application_id = 13) AS TRANSCUSTOMERSTATUS, (select sop.dept_segment_num from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID) AS TRANSSRCDEPTFLEXSEGMENTNUM, (select inv.currency_code from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID) AS TRANSSRCCURRENCYCODE, (select xct.precision from xxfi_currencies_t xct, xxinv_business_units_t xbut where xbut.currency_code = xct.currency_code and xbut.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID) AS TRANSSRCPRECISION, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.TERMS_CONDITIONS, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SCOPE_OF_WORK, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.NOTE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.LINE_TYPE, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.LINE_TYPE and xlvt.lookup_type = 'ORDER_LINE_TYPES') AS TRANS_LINE_TYPE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.TAX_RATE_CODE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.TAX_RATE_ID, (select PERCENTAGE_RATE from xxfi_tax_codes_t where trunc(sysdate) between trunc(effective_from) and nvl(trunc(effective_to),trunc(sysdate)) and tax_rate_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.TAX_RATE_ID) AS TRANS_TAX_RATE_PERCENT, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SITE_CONTACT_PERSON, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SITE_CONTACT_PERSON_EMAIL, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SITE_CONTACT_PERSON_NUMBER, (select name from xxra_terms_t where term_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.PAYMENT_TERM_ID) AS TRANS_PAYMENT_TERMS, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.PAYMENT_TERM_ID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SALES_REP_ID, (select party_name from XXFI_SALESPERSONS_T where resource_salesrep_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SALES_REP_ID) AS TRANS_SALESPERSON, NVL((select 'Y' from dual where exists (select contract_id from xxads_rental_contract_t rc where rc.contract_source = 'Q' and rc.master_reference_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.MASTER_QUOTE_ID and rc.contract_status != 'C')),'N') AS TRANSCONTRACTGENERATEFLAG, (select contract_number from (select rc.contract_number from xxads_rental_contract_t rc where rc.contract_source = 'Q' and rc.master_reference_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.MASTER_QUOTE_ID order by quotation_id) where rownum = 1) AS TRANSCONTRACTNUMBER, (select contract_id from (select rc.contract_id from xxads_rental_contract_t rc where rc.contract_source = 'Q' and rc.master_reference_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.MASTER_QUOTE_ID order by quotation_id) where rownum = 1) AS TRANSCONTRACTID, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.ORDER_TYPE, (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.ORDER_TYPE and xlvt.lookup_type = 'ORDER_TYPES') AS TRANSORDERTYPE, XxadsRentalQuoteEO.QUOTE_NUMBER AS QUOTE_NUMBER1, (select set_id from XXINV_BUSINESS_UNITS_T where bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REQ_BU_ID) AS TRANSSETID

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSourceBu
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select inv.bu_name from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSourceDivRequired
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select nvl(sop.division_required,'N') from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSrcDivFlexSegmentNum
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sop.segment_num from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransRequestingBu
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select inv.bu_name from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REQ_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransReqBuDivSegment
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sop.SEGMENT_NUM from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REQ_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransReqBuDeptSegment
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sop.DEPT_SEGMENT_NUM from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REQ_BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCustomerType
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_CUSTOMER_TYPES' and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CUSTOMER_TYPE)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransProject
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xpj.project_number||' - '||xpj.project_name from xxpj_projects_t xpj where xpj.project_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.PROJECT_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransDivision
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.DIV_FLEX_VALUE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransDeptName
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select fv.flex_value||' - '|| fv.description from fnd_flex_values_vl fv where fv.flex_value_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.DEPT_FLEX_VALUE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCustomerName
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xcdt.customer_name from xxfi_customer_details_t xcdt where xcdt.cust_account_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CUSTOMER_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCustomerSite
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT xcsdt.bill_to_site||' - '||xcsdt.address from xxfi_customer_site_details_t xcsdt where xcsdt.site_use_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SITE_USE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransQuotationStatus
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_QUOTATION_STATUS' and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.QUOTE_STATUS AND xlvt.application_id = 13)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransCustomerStatus
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_type = 'XXADS_CUSTOMER_STATUS' and xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.CUSTOMER_STATUS AND xlvt.application_id = 13)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSrcDeptFlexSegmentNum
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select sop.dept_segment_num from xxads_system_options_t sop where sop.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSrcCurrencyCode
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select inv.currency_code from xxinv_business_units_t inv where inv.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSrcPrecision
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xct.precision from xxfi_currencies_t xct, xxinv_business_units_t xbut where xbut.currency_code = xct.currency_code and xbut.bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.BU_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTotalAmount
ViewAttribute.TransientExpression: (RentalQuoteLinesVO1.getRowSet().sum('LineValue != null ? LineValue : 0') == null ? 0 : RentalQuoteLinesVO1.getRowSet().sum('LineValue != null ? LineValue : 0'))+(RentalQuoteChargesVO1.getRowSet().sum('Amount!= null ? Amount : 0') == null ? 0 : RentalQuoteChargesVO1.getRowSet().sum('Amount!= null ? Amount : 0'))+(RentalQuoteLinesVO1.getRowSet().sum('VatTaxAmount != null ? VatTaxAmount : 0') == null ? 0 : RentalQuoteLinesVO1.getRowSet().sum('VatTaxAmount != null ? VatTaxAmount : 0'))+(RentalQuoteChargesVO1.getRowSet().sum('VatTaxAmount!= null ? VatTaxAmount : 0') == null ? 0 : RentalQuoteChargesVO1.getRowSet().sum('VatTaxAmount!= null ? VatTaxAmount : 0'))

ViewAttribute.Name: TransLineType
ViewAttribute.Expression: select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.LINE_TYPE and xlvt.lookup_type = 'ORDER_LINE_TYPES'

ViewAttribute.Name: TransTaxRatePercent
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select PERCENTAGE_RATE from xxfi_tax_codes_t where trunc(sysdate) between trunc(effective_from) and nvl(trunc(effective_to),trunc(sysdate)) and tax_rate_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.TAX_RATE_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransPaymentTerm
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select name from xxra_terms_t where term_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.PAYMENT_TERM_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSalesPerson
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select party_name from XXFI_SALESPERSONS_T where resource_salesrep_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.SALES_REP_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransContractGenerateFlag
ViewAttribute.Expression: NVL((select 'Y' from dual where exists (select contract_id from xxads_rental_contract_t rc where rc.contract_source = 'Q' and rc.master_reference_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.MASTER_QUOTE_ID and rc.contract_status != 'C')),'N')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransContractNumber
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select contract_number from (select rc.contract_number from xxads_rental_contract_t rc where rc.contract_source = 'Q' and rc.master_reference_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.MASTER_QUOTE_ID order by quotation_id) where rownum = 1)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransContractId
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select contract_id from (select rc.contract_id from xxads_rental_contract_t rc where rc.contract_source = 'Q' and rc.master_reference_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.MASTER_QUOTE_ID order by quotation_id) where rownum = 1)

ViewAttribute.Name: TransOrderType
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select xlvt.meaning from xxcust_lookup_values_t xlvt where xlvt.lookup_code = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.ORDER_TYPE and xlvt.lookup_type = 'ORDER_TYPES')

ViewAttribute.Name: TransSetId
ViewAttribute.Expression: (select set_id from XXINV_BUSINESS_UNITS_T where bu_id = XxadsRentalQuoteEO.REQ_BU_ID)
